subject: Re: Bret Contreras Website – Next Steps
preview: This is now done, closing this ticket now. Thank you!  Link: https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-bretcontreras-com/ahxyuxh5di?form_factor=mobile

full_threads.body:
This is now done, closing this ticket now. Thank you!

Link: https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-bretcontreras-com/ahxyuxh5di?form_factor=mobile

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hey team! Confirming that SEO meta description is now live: https://bretcontreras.com/ :)

Next Step:
  1. @manuel to increase mobile optimisation from 67 to 80

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Update; we've added the h2 , h3 and h1. Thank you ate @ljD for making this possible
Link: https://staging-bretcontreras.kinsta.cloud/contact-bret/
Update: I've added all the SEO Meta description of all the websites
Update: I've created the SEO meta description of each, passing it to my manager before I update it

Hi Team,
Thanks so much! I've completed an SEO audit across key pages of the website and will begin implementing the necessary improvements.

Below are the planned action items by page:

Home
  • Improve SEO meta description
About Me
  • Update SEO meta description
  • Refine heading structure
All Articles
  • Enhance SEO meta description
  • Flag pages that redundant and doesn't have a link anymore example (https://staging-bretcontreras.kinsta.cloud/core-training-guest-articles/)
Testimonials
  • Optimize SEO meta description
  • Improve heading structure
FAQs
  • Add or revise SEO meta description
  • Set canonical tag
  • Refine heading hierarchy
Contact
  • Update SEO meta description

I'll update you all once, I finish all the items in my checlist

@allieB @cindy

I think you should focus on the staging site since it's built on WordPress, which is currently working live. The store, however, was created using the Shopify platform, and I don't think we have access to that.

hope it help

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena
Allie Borcena assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Hey ate @Cindy - I just wanted to clarify, it looks very different from the staging and official link, where should I upload my SEO structure 

For the staging: https://staging-bretcontreras.kinsta.cloud/about-me/
For the official link: https://www.bretcontreras.store/

action.text: Cindy Valderama assigned to Allie Borcena
Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
@cindy
For now, I’ve made the changes on the staging site only, as I updated the slide—which was one of the causes of the site's slow loading performance.

@allieB
Please review your assigned tasks as well. I’m not entirely sure if any updates are needed on your end.
Try to update on staging site first https://staging-bretcontreras.kinsta.cloud/

Once everything looks good, we can proceed to update the live site.
https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-staging-bretcontreras-kinsta-cloud/vu2cglvu5l?form_factor=mobile

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
@manuel
>> 1. Improve mobile site speed and responsiveness
>> 2. Clean up outdated plugins and scripts
>> 3. Compress large images and banners
>> 6. Fix any broken internal links

@allieB - with Lance's assistance
>> 4. Add missing meta descriptions and H1 tags
>> 5. Tidy page headings (H2/H3 structure)
>> 7. Audit technical SEO issues (titles, schema, indexing)
>> 8. Standardize page layouts and spacing
>> 9. Flag any redundant or legacy content for removal

@allieB - Updates needed:


>> 1. Improve mobile site speed and responsiveness
>> 2. Clean up outdated plugins and scripts
>> 3. Compress large images and banners
>> 4. Add missing meta descriptions and H1 tags
>> 5. Tidy page headings (H2/H3 structure)
>> 6. Fix any broken internal links
>> 7. Audit technical SEO issues (titles, schema, indexing)
>> 8. Standardize page layouts and spacing
>> 9. Flag any redundant or legacy content for removal

Let me know once done so I can pass back to client. Thanks!

action.text: Daphne Bautista assigned to Allie Borcena
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Daphne Bautista

full_threads.body:
Non-urgent, okay to complete in July. Thank you

Please have VV / DB draft an email back to client from me once done.

Thank you

*

Hi Andy,

Fantastic. Let me know if you need anything in the meantime.

Best regards,

Matt

On Wed, 18 Jun 2025 at 14:22, Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Hi Matt,

For sure - we'll take care of these as part of the current plan and
confirm once all done (likely next month).

Thanks for working with us and let us know if we can be helpful in anyway.

Andy

wrote:

> Hi Andy,
>
> These things all seem good to me, and I don't have anything to add. If

> On Mon, 16 Jun 2025 at 12:34, Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
>
>> Hi Matt,
>>
>> Thanks - appreciate the context.
>>
>> Based on our initial review, here’s a list of general updates we’d
>> recommend:
>>
>> 1. Improve mobile site speed and responsiveness
>> 2. Clean up outdated plugins and scripts
>> 3. Compress large images and banners
>> 4. Add missing meta descriptions and H1 tags
>> 5. Tidy page headings (H2/H3 structure)
>> 6. Fix any broken internal links
>> 7. Audit technical SEO issues (titles, schema, indexing)
>> 8. Standardize page layouts and spacing
>> 9. Flag any redundant or legacy content for removal
>>
>> These would be low-lift improvements to tidy the site and keep things
>> running smoothly while plans for broader changes are still in discussion.
>>
>> We're happy to chip away at this as part of the expert plan with Wolf IQ.
>>
>> Let us know if you'd like us to get started - or if there’s anything
>> else you’d like added to the list.
>>
>> Thanks,
>> Andy
